hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas reported that Duba'a bint al-Zubair b. 'Abd al-Muttalib (Allah be pleased with her) came to Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) and said:I am an ailing woman but I intend to perform Hajj; what you command me (to do)? He (the Holy Prophet) said: Enter into the state of Ihram (uttering these words) of condition: I would be free from it when Thou wouldst detain me. 'He (the narrator) said: But she was able to complete (the Hajj without breaking down)

chapter.ara-name: باب جَوَازِ اشْتِرَاطِ الْمُحْرِمِ التَّحَلُّلَ بِعُذْرِ الْمَرَضِ وَنَحْوِهِ
chapter.eng-name: It is permissible for the Muhrim to stipulate a condition for exiting Ihram because of sickness and the like
